statements: SELECT * FROM WaterIrrigationSystem ORDER BY sensor_id DESC, sensor_location ASC
SELECT id, sensor_location, water_pressure FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE irrigation_status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT sensor_id, irrigation_status FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE water_pressure > 50
SELECT * FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE sensor_location LIKE 'Garden%'
SELECT id, sensor_id, water_pressure, irrigation_status FROM WaterIrrigationSystem ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE water_pressure > 10 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_location, irrigation_status FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND water_pressure < 5;
SELECT id, sensor_location, water_pressure FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE irrigation_status = 'active' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%garden%' AND irrigation_status = 'inactive';
SELECT id, sensor_id, sensor_location, water_pressure, irrigation_status FROM WaterIrrigationSystem WHERE sensor_id >= 5 ORDER BY water_pressure DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM water_usage WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT amount, date FROM water_usage WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, amount, date FROM water_usage WHERE crop_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, crop_id, amount FROM water_usage WHERE amount > 100 AND crop_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE crop_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, crop_id, amount FROM water_usage WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT w.id, w.date, w.amount, i.type FROM water_usage w JOIN irrigation_system i ON w.crop_id = i.id WHERE i.status = 'Active';
SELECT w.id, w.date, i.type, i.status FROM water_usage w LEFT JOIN irrigation_system i ON w.crop_id = i.id WHERE i.location = 'Farm A';
SELECT AVG(amount) as average_amount FROM water_usage WHERE crop_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM water_usage;
SELECT crop_id, water_quantity FROM water_usage ORDER BY water_quantity DESC;
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_management WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, pump_capacity FROM irrigation_system WHERE pump_capacity >= 500;
SELECT water_quantity, date FROM water_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE water_quantity > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_management WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT system_name, pump_capacity, water_source FROM irrigation_system WHERE pump_capacity >= 5000 ORDER BY pump_capacity DESC;
SELECT id, crop_id, water_quantity, date FROM water_usage WHERE crop_id = 1 AND date < '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_management WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Maize%';
SELECT * FROM water_sources;
SELECT source_name, water_type, capacity FROM water_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT water_type, source_name FROM water_sources WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT id, source_name FROM water_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_sources WHERE water_type = 'River' ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_sources WHERE water_type = 'Well' ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT id, source_name FROM water_sources WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY source_name
SELECT source_name, water_type, capacity FROM water_sources WHERE capacity < 500 AND water_type = 'Spring'
SELECT * FROM water_sources WHERE capacity BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT id, source_name, water_type FROM water_sources WHERE capacity > 300
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, crop_name, water_amount FROM WaterUsage WHERE water_amount > 100;
SELECT location, system_name FROM IrrigationSystems WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CropManagement WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering';
SELECT sensor_name, location, type FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(water_amount) AS total_water FROM WaterUsage GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY total_water DESC;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystems WHERE status = TRUE AND location LIKE 'Farm%';
SELECT * FROM CropManagement WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering' AND planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT sensor_name, type, COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM Sensors GROUP BY sensor_name, type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_sensors DESC;
